scripts.stop: docker stop mcpdict_backend || true && docker rm mcpdict_backend || true
scripts.deploy: docker build --build-arg TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) -t mcpdict_backend . && docker stop mcpdict_backend || true && docker rm mcpdict_backend || true && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 --name mcpdict_backend mcpdict_backend
scripts.push: docker image tag mcpdict_backend:latest dockerhub.vear.vip/mcpdict_backend && docker push dockerhub.vear.vip/mcpdict_backend
scripts.pushali: docker login --username=1262122327@qq.com crpi-y6tzwvqgvhqozlnl.cn-hangzhou.personal.cr.aliyuncs.com && docker image tag mcpdict_backend crpi-y6tzwvqgvhqozlnl.cn-hangzhou.personal.cr.aliyuncs.com/vear_dockerhub/mcpdict_backend:latest && docker push crpi-y6tzwvqgvhqozlnl.cn-hangzhou.personal.cr.aliyuncs.com/vear_dockerhub/mcpdict_backend:latest
